Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute near 60th/Dorchester
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses temp. rerouted : due to, Street Blockage near 60th/Dorchester.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses temp. rerouted : due to, Street Blockage near 60th/Dorchester.

Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 60th/Dorchester due to street blockage near 60th/Dorchester.

Eastbound buses will operate via Woodlawn, Midway Plaisance, Stony Island and 60th including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via 60th, Woodlawn and 61st Street.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor, #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Ogden/Rockwell
ShortDescription: Eastbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor, 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near Ogden/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor, 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near Ogden/Rockwell.

Eastbound buses are temporarily rerouted via Ogden, California, Roosevelt and Western including the normal route streets, due to street blockage near Ogden/Rockwell.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
